alert.note: Alert for Elkhart; Lagrange; Noble (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 3:48PM EDT until July 20 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Elkhart County in north central Indiana... Northwestern Noble County in northeastern Indiana... Southwestern Lagrange County in northeastern Indiana... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 347 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Goshen, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ligonier, Middlebury, Albion, Rome City, Topeka, Millersburg, Wolcottville, Brimfield, Honeyville, Woodruff, Eddy, Adams Lake, Oliver Lake, Emma, and Cosperville. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
